heisig_chinese_memo: No mother will let herself feel defeated no matter how hard her bundle of joy is to take care of.  It will always be able to rely on her.
Ru_trainchinese: lài: (глаг/прил) отказываться от своего слова; перекладывать вину на другого; винить; полагаться на; оставаться на одном месте, не желать уходить; (разг.) хороший
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: No mother will let herself feel defeated no matter how hard her bundle of joy is to take care of.  It will always be able to rely on her.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " bei " and " slaying ", the original meaning is benefit. "Shuowen": "Win. Congbei, Lisheng." "Mandarin·Jin Yuyi": "Cang is surplus, neighbors obey, seal Xinjiang, the king depends on it." Wei Zhao's note: "Lai, Li Ye ."

" Lai " can mean gain and benefit. "Shu‧Lu Xing": "A person has celebration, Zhaomin relies on it." Kong Yingdashu: "The emperor has goodness, teach the world with good deeds, and Zhaomin will be relied upon."

" Lai " also means to rely on and rely on. "Shu‧ Dayumo": "The emperor said: "Yu, the earth is peaceful and the sky is perfect, the three things of the six houses are governed, and the time is the power." Everything is governed by all beliefs, and the reliance of all generations is your contribution."

" Lai " also means to obtain. "Zhuangzi·Rangwang": "If the uncles of the Bo Yi are together, they are rich and noble, and they can get what they have." Zhang Binglin explained the reason and quoted "Dialect": "Lai, take the same."

" Lai " also expressed denial and non-acceptance. "Qing Ping Shan Tang Script-Misrecognizing the Corpse": "Wang Jiu Jiu said: "Big lady, don't lie! Keep it away from others, don't lie to me.""

" Lai " also means shame, and also refers to the style and behavior of a rogue. Ming Tang Xianzu "The Peony Pavilion: Banquet": "This hospital has its own forbidden appointments. Where is it shabby and dare to come to Hulai?

" Lai " also expresses false accusation. "Jing Hua Yuan" Chapter 76: "You have to rely on people to be a thief, and tell the lies more completely!"

" Lai " also blamed it. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 59: "What kind of paper did you burn the day before yesterday? I told my aunt to see it and want to sue you for not being successful, but Baoyu lied on him a lot."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Bei " and "剌", the original meaning is benefit.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「剌」聲，本義為利益。《說文》：「贏也。从貝，剌聲。」《國語‧晉語一》：「倉稟盈，四鄰服，封疆信，君得其賴。」韋昭注：「賴，利也。」

　　「賴」可表示得益、受益。《書‧呂刑》：「一人有慶，兆民賴之。」孔穎達疏：「天子有善，以善事教天下，則兆民蒙賴之。」

　　「賴」也表示依靠、憑藉。《書‧大禹謨》：「帝曰：『俞，地平天成，六府三事允治，萬世永賴，時乃功。』」孔穎達疏：「汝治水土，使地平天成，六府三事信皆治理，萬代長所恃賴，是汝之功也。」

　　「賴」亦表示獲取。《莊子‧讓王》：「若伯夷叔齊者，其於富貴也，苟可得已，則必不賴。」章炳麟解故引《方言》：「賴，取也。」

　　「賴」還表示抵賴、不認賬。《清平山堂話本‧錯認尸》：「王酒酒道：『大娘子，你不要賴！瞞了別人，不要瞞我。』」

　　「賴」亦表示耍賴，亦指無賴的作風和行為。明湯顯祖《牡丹亭‧鬧宴》：「本院自有禁約，何處寒酸，敢來胡賴？」

　　「賴」還表示誣賴。《鏡花緣》第76回：「你要賴人做賊，也把謊兒撒的完全些！」

　　「賴」亦指責怪。《紅樓夢》第59回：「前日你到底燒了什麼紙？叫我姨媽看見了，要告你沒告成，倒被寶玉賴了他好些不是。」
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
賴 (Simplified: 赖)
Pinyin: lài
English Definition: to depend on; to hang on in a place; bad; to renege (on promise); to disclaim; to rat (on debts); rascally; to blame; to put the blame on
Synonym: 劣 差
Antonyms: 好 良 優
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 貝
Pictophonetic: 束 indicates the sound; 負 (money) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 束 [ shù ] to bind, to control, to restrain; bale
    • 負 [ fù ] load, burden; to carry, to bear
Example Words:
賴以 [ lài yǐ ]: to rely on; to depend on
More: 賴* | *賴 | *賴*

從「 貝 」，「 剌 」聲，本義為利益。《說文》：「贏也。从貝，剌聲。」《國語‧晉語一》：「倉稟盈，四鄰服，封疆信，君得其賴。」韋昭注：「賴，利也。」 「 賴 」可表示得益、受益。《書‧呂刑》：「一人有慶，兆民賴之。」孔穎達疏：「天子有善，以善事教天下，則兆民蒙賴之。」 「 賴 」也表示依靠、憑藉。《書‧大禹謨》：「帝曰：『俞，地平天成，六府三事允治，萬世永賴，時乃功。』」孔穎達疏：「汝治水土，使地平天成，六府三事信皆治理，萬代長所恃賴，是汝之功也。」 「 賴 」亦表示獲取。《莊子‧讓王》：「若伯夷叔齊者，其於富貴也，苟可得已，則必不賴。」章炳麟解故引《方言》：「賴，取也。」 「 賴 」還表示抵賴、不認賬。《清平山堂話本‧錯認尸》：「王酒酒道：『大娘子，你不要賴！瞞了別人，不要瞞我。』」 「 賴 」亦表示耍賴，亦指無賴的作風和行為。明湯顯祖《牡丹亭‧鬧宴》：「本院自有禁約，何處寒酸，敢來胡賴？」 「 賴 」還表示誣賴。《鏡花緣》第76回：「你要賴人做賊，也把謊兒撒的完全些！」 「 賴 」亦指責怪。《紅樓夢》第59回：「前日你到底燒了什麼紙？叫我姨媽看見了，要告你沒告成，倒被寶玉賴了他好些不是。」

賴字的基本解释

賴
lài
见“赖”。

賴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《廣韻》落蓋切，去泰，來。］
“赖1”的繁体字。亦作“頼1”。
(1)利益；好处。
(2)得益，受益。
(3)依靠；凭借。
(4)取；获取。
(5)骗取。
(6)抵赖；不认账。
(7)诬枉；诬赖。
(8)耍赖。亦指无赖的作风和行为。
(9)责怪。
(10)留在某处不肯离开。
(11)坏；差。
(12)幸而；幸亏。
(13)通“懶”。懒惰。
(14)通“厲”。祸患，有害于。
(15)通“厲”。恶疮病。
(16)通“藾”。植物名。通称藾蒿。
(17)古国名。在今湖北省随州市。
(18)古地名。春秋齐邑。在今山东聊城西。
(19)姓。

賴字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賴； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1210第31
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?落蓋切，音癩。【說文】贏也。【類篇】一曰恃也。【書·大禹謨】萬世永賴。【疏】萬代常所恃賴。　又【史記·高祖紀】大人常以臣無賴。【註】晉灼曰：賴，利也。無利於家也。或曰江淮之閒謂小兒多詐狡猾爲無賴。　又【揚子·方言】予賴，讎也。南楚之外曰賴，秦晉曰讎。【註】賴，亦惡名。　又姓。【風俗通】交阯太守賴先。【玉海】賴氏，國名。漢有校尉賴丹。　又【韻補】叶力制切。【班固·答賓戲】福不盈眥，禍溢于世，凶人且以自悔，况吉士而是賴。○按《說文》从貝剌聲。俗作頼。非。

賴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
賴字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
rely
lài

rely
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Guangyun" Go to Thailand, come. ]
Traditional characters of "赖1". Also known as "頼1".
(1) Benefits; benefits.
(2) Benefit, benefit.
(3) Rely on; rely on.
(4) Take; get.
(5) Fraud.
(6) Denial; denial.
(7) False; false.
(8) Shame. Also refers to the style and behavior of a rogue.
(9) Blame.
(10) Stay somewhere and refuse to leave.
(11) Bad; bad.
(12) Fortunately; Fortunately.
(13) Through "lazy". lazy.
(14) Through "Li". Disaster, harmful to.
(15) Through "Li". Malignant sores.
(16) Through "藾". Botanical name. Commonly known as Artemisia rotundifolia.
(17) Ancient country name. In today's Suizhou City, Hubei Province.
(18) Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Qiyi. In today's west of Liaocheng, Shandong.
(19) Last name.
rely
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　 Lai; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1210 Page 31
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Luo Gaiqie, Yin Lei. [Said Wen] Win too. 【Classes】One said that you can also rely on it. 【Book·Da Yumo】Living forever. 【Sparse】Bandai often rely on.　[Historical Records·Gao Zu Ji] Adults are often rascals as ministers. [Note] Jin Zhuo said: Lai, Li Ye. It's not good for home either. Or it can be said that Jianghuai’s leisure is that children are sly and cunning as a rogue.　[Yangtze Dialect] Yu Lai, Yu Ye. Outside the Southern Chu, it is called Lai, and in the Qin and Jin Dynasties it is called Yu. [Note] Lai, also notorious.　Another last name. [Customs and Customs] Handed over to the prefect Lai Xian. [Jade Sea] Lai’s, the name of the country. Han has a school lieutenant Laidan.　【Rhyme Filling】Ye Li cuts. [Ban Gu·A Bin Opera] Fortune is not full of canthus, misfortune is overflowing in the world, and the wicked person regrets himself, but it depends on the custard. ○Press "Said Wen" from Bei Lasheng. Popular as 頼. non.
